welcome: Welcome to your personal running assistant!
greeting: Hello, I'm your running coach. How can I help you today?
farewell: See you soon! Keep running and improving.
language_changed: You have changed the language to English.
language_already_set: Your language is already set to English
language_command_help: You can change the language using /english or /español

fallback.message:
Sorry, I had trouble processing your message. Could you try again?

You can tell me about:
🏃‍♂️ Your runs (e.g., "I ran 5K in 25 minutes")
📋 Training plans
🎯 Race goals
💪 How you feel after running

I'm here to help you improve your running!

error: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again.
help: You can ask me about your training plan, log a run, or ask for running advice.
